original_text: These are the families of the Reubenites: and they that were numbered of them were forty and three thousand and seven hundred and thirty.
korean_text: 이는 르우벤 종족들이라 계수된 자가 사만 삼천칠백삼십 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: These are the families of the Reubenites
and they that were numbered of them
were forty and three thousand and seven hundred and thirty
